price: 43 « Voici la Géhenne que les impies traitaient de mensonge ! »
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
